entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as giving advice to Ron. She says 'Hold tight now, Ron'.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as receiving advice from Tonks and throwing a guilty look at Lupin.

entities.name: Lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the object of Ron's guilty look.

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as kicking a motorbike into life.

entities.name: Moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as shouting 'Good luck, everyone'.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as feeling discomfort in his legs.

entities.name: Hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig's cage is mentioned as being in the sidecar with Harry.

entities.name: Privet Drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is mentioned as number four and visible to Harry before he looks over the edge of the sidecar.

entities.name: Burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as where everyone will meet in about an hour.

relationships.description: Tonks advises Ron to hold tight.
Hagrid kicks the motorbike into life.
Moody greets everyone with 'Good luck, everyone'.
Harry sees Privet Drive before he looks over the edge of the sidecar.
Everyone will meet at the Burrow in about an hour.
